home.title: Hanyoyin Noma Mai Hankali don Afirka da Ƙari
home.subtitle: Bayanan noma da AI ke tafiyar da ita don haɓaka yawan amfani da riba na gonar ku

cropPlanner.title: Shirye-shiryen Amfani Mai Hankali
cropPlanner.description: Sami shawarwari da AI ke bayarwa game da mafi kyawun amfanin gona da za ku noma bisa ga wurin ku, ƙasa da yanayi

soilAdvisor.title: Binciken Lafiyar Ƙasa
soilAdvisor.description: Bincika yanayin ƙasar ku kuma ku sami shawarwari na musamman game da gudanar da abinci mai gina jiki

waterOptimizer.title: Gudanar Ruwa
waterOptimizer.description: Haɓaka amfani da ruwa tare da jadawalin ban ruwa mai hankali da dabarun kiyayewa

marketEstimator.title: Bayanan Kasuwa
marketEstimator.description: Sami ƙididdige farashin kasuwa na lokaci-lokaci da mafi kyawun dabarun siyarwa don amfanin gonar ku
